attributes.action: GIVE THE GURKAS THE SAME RIGHTS AS ALL OTHER UK MILITARY PERSONNEL
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I petition you, Gordon Brown as PM of our country to give the Gurkas, who served this country & fought for us to be given the same rights as all other military personnel as well as all other non British people that are let into the UK. I petition you to allow them to stay & live in the UK as is their right.

rejection.details:
There is a similar petition at:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Gurkha-soldiers/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
